titleStmt.title: Some thoughts on the bill depending before the right honourable the House of Lords for prohibiting the exportation of the woolen manufactures of Ireland to foreign parts, humbly offer'd to their lordships.
titleStmt.author: Cox, Richard, Sir, 1650-1733.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Cox. cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
